title: Champion Concepts by A Modern Hippy
body:
I spend a lot of time writing League fan-fiction and coming up with champion concepts, so I figured that I may as well share them and see what other people think. I'm well aware the concepts are nowhere near playable as they are, and at this point I'm just interested in seeing what people think of the mechanics of each concept and their opinions on how the concepts would fit into the game.

Enjoy. ^_^

replies.body:
Morlock
The Turned Sprite

AA Type: Melee = Staff/Dagger
Cost Type: Mana

Passive: Dark Heart - Assists reduce the CD of Takeover by 3 seconds, and Kills reduce it by 5 seconds. When an enemy champion dies nearby and Morlock did not get an assist or a kill, the CD of Takeover is reduced by 1 second. Totempole; Every time an enemy unit dies near Morlock, there is a 2% chance of a Faeling being summoned.

Q:	Rage Totem - Planting his staff in the ground, Morlock summons a small Faeling to aid him for 6/7/8/9/10 seconds. The Faeling takes aggro, slows enemies it attacks by 18/21/24/27/30% for 1 second, and detonates dealing 80/125/170/230/280 (+0.8 AP) upon being destroyed or when the timer runs out. [CD 20/17/14/12/10 seconds, 75 mana]

W:	Black Flash - Morlock teleports to a location, dealing 75/110/160/210/280 (+7/9/11/13/15% of his max HP) as magic damage in a radius around him and blinding enemies hit for 1/1.25/1.5/1.75/2 seconds. [CD 8/7/6/5/4 seconds, 50 mana]

E:	Ravenous Blade - Morlock’s next basic attack deals 20/55/100/155/220 (+0.7 AP) bonus damage and slows the target by 10/15/20/25/30% for 4 seconds. If a unit is killed while crippled by Ravenous Blade, the CD is instantly refreshed. If a unit is killed by Ravenous Blade, double the cost is refunded and CD is instantly refreshed. If Ravenous Blade is used on a blinded unit, that unit is instead stunned for 0.25/0.5/0.75/1/1.25 seconds. [CD 15/13/11/9/7 seconds, 60 mana]

R:	Takeover - Morlock unleashes his inner demon, becoming possessed by that shade for 10/15/20 seconds. While in Takeover, Morlock gains 20/25/30% bonus maximum HP, a 40/45/50% MS boost, and instead of Totem, Flash or Blade, he has a leap attack that he can use up to three times, once for each skill. The leap deals 150/200/250 (+0.7 AP) and slows enemy units hit by 25%. While Takeover is active, kills and assists will refresh the CD of the leap. [CD 300/240/180 seconds, no cost]


City/Faction: Shadow Isles
Position: Jungle/Top
Role: APT/Tank/APC

True that. Forgot people did that kind of thing. Thank you. ^_^

Edit: I've altered W, reducing the max health ratio and adding base damage.
That moment when the OP is talking to himself ...
I'm not sure I understand what you mean. I should drop the champion concepts, or you'd like me to put some up?

Mortil
The Deadsbane

AA Type: Melee = Wide Hand Slashes
Cost Type: Health

Passive: Undeath; Upon dropping below 40% HP, Mortil reduces all incoming damage by 50% for 10 seconds, gains (+ AD) and (+ AP) (scaling with level), and is slowed by 10%. Contamination; The effects of all Mortil’s skills will remain active for 5 seconds after switching to another skill, including on hit effects. [CD 180 seconds]

Q:	Banshee - While channeling the Banshee, Mortil takes 12/14/16/18/20% reduced damage, and every 7th/6th/5th/4th/3rd basic attack will silence the next enemy struck for 1/1.25/1.5/1.75/2 seconds. Ignores unit collision. [CD 7/6/5/4/3 seconds, __ health]

W:	Vampire - Channels the essence of the Vampire, regenerating 2/3/4/5/6% of Mortil’s maximum HP every second. Additionally, every 9th/8th/7th/6th/5th basic attack will deal 50/100/150/200/250 (+0.8 AD) bonus damage and heal him for 40/75/110/145/180 (+0.8 AP). [CD 7/6/5/4/3 seconds, __ health]

E:	Zombie - When channeling the Zombie, Mortil’s health will degenerate at a rate of 2% of his current health per second and he is slowed by 10%. When an enemy unit dies near Mortil while Zombie is active, he is healed for 1/2/3/4/5% of his maximum HP. When an enemy champion dies near Mortil while Zombie is active, he is healed for 22/24/26/28/30% of his maximum HP and gains a 20/30/40/50/60% MS boost for 5 seconds. [CD 7/6/5/4/3 seconds, __ health]

R:	Skeleton - In the form of the Skeleton, Mortil gains a 10/20/30/40/50% MS boost and 30/40/50/60/70% bonus AS. Every 8th/7th/6th/5th/4th basic attack becomes ranged, deals 30/70/110/150/190 (+1.2 AP) bonus magic damage and slows by 10/13/16/19/21% for 1/1.5/2/2.5/3 seconds. Proccing the effects of Banshee, Vampire or Zombie adds a charge to Skeleton, up to a maximum of 4. When Skeleton is activated, Mortil consumes the charges to summon little skeletons to help him that deal 80% of his AD and have his AS and MS. Lifesteal is applied to the damage of the skeletons, but they do not apply on hit effects. [CD 7/6/5/4/3 seconds, __ health]


City/Faction: Shadow Isles
Position: Top/Jungle
Role: Bruiser/Tank/AD

Amrath
The Void Warden

AA Type: Ranged = Hand beams
Cost Type: Mana

Passive: Null Armament - Every fourth ability gains an additional effect. Passive Magic Penetration, scaling with champion level.

Q:	Null Helm - Amrath channels null void energy through his eyes at a target enemy, dealing 90/110/150/200/260 (+0.9 AP). Null Armament; Can cast again immediately with no cost, dealing 110/140/180/230/290 (+0.9 AP). [CD 9/8/7/6/5 seconds, __ mana]

W:	Null Ward - Amrath summons a protective barrier around himself or an allied champion for 2 seconds, negating the next incoming AA or ability and healing the shielded unit for 70/100/130/160/190 (+0.6 AP). Null Armament; Ward lasts for 4 seconds, heals +50% and grants a 50% MS boost for 1/2/3/4/5 seconds. [CD 19/17/15/13/11 seconds, __ mana]

E:	Void Avoid - Amrath becomes untargetable and gains a 45/55/65/75/85% MS boost for 2 seconds. Amrath is unable to activate skills or items while in this state. Null Armament; When the effect ends, he deals 100/135/180/235/300 (+0.4 AP) in a radius around him. [CD 15/13/11/9/7 seconds, __ mana]

R:	Null Port - After channeling for 4 seconds, Amrath switches places with an allied unit. During the channel, the target unit gains 100/175/250 AR and MR and a 30% MS boost. After the channel ends, the target unit loses the AR/MR boost but retains the MS boost for 3/4/5 seconds. [CD 300/240/180 seconds, no cost]


City/Faction: Void
Position: Mid/Top/Bot
Role: APC/APB/Sup

Floren
The Polleness

AA Type: Ranged = Seeds
Cost Type: Mana

Passive: Earth’s Blessing - Kills and assists grant Floren +30 maximum Health and Mana permanently (includes Baron and Dragon). Minion kills grant +2 maximum Health and Mana.

Q:	Root Strike - a root erupts from the ground, dealing 75/110/150/200/265 (+0.8 AP) damage. The root will remain for 10 seconds after casting, and if passed over by an enemy unit will deal the same damage again before disappearing. World Tree; knocks up enemy units hit. [CD 7/6/5/4/3 seconds, 50 mana]

W:	Weeping Willow - Floren summons a Willow from the earth to weaken her enemies. The tree deals 40/70/120/180/250 (+0.4 AP) damage per second to all enemy units within a radius, and slows them by 15/20/25/30/35%. World Tree; seed pods deal 200% damage to enemy units in the blast, but no longer slows. [CD 21/19/17/15/13 seconds, 80 mana(lvl1)]

E:	Evergreen Oak - Floren summons an ancient Oak to the Fields to aid her allies. The tree grants nearby allied units bonus 20/45/70/95/120 HpS and MpS, and provides a 100 point shield that increases by 25 points per second up to a total of 250. World Tree; seed pods provide an instantaneous 200 point shield to allied units in the blast, but no longer provide regeneration. [CD 25/23/21/19/17 seconds, 100 mana(lvl1)]

R:	World Tree - After channeling for 2 seconds, Floren releases the power inside her, turning into the World Tree for 10/15/20 seconds. While in this form she is slowed by 50%, has 50% bonus HP and no mana costs, and 60% CDR on her E and W. Also while in this form, her W and E become seed pods launched at a location that detonate on impact. [CD 300/240/180 seconds, 150 mana(lvl1)]


City/Faction: Ionia
Position: Bot/Mid
Role: Support/APC

Fenrir
The Forlorn

AA Type: Melee = Bites (Companion) and Swipes (Wereform)
Cost Type: Mana

Passive: Blessing of the Cursed - Companion; Gains bonus MR equal to 5% of his maximum HP. Wereform; Gains Bonus AR equal to 5% of his max HP.

Q: 	Loyalty - Can shield himself or a nearby ally for an amount equal to 10% of his maximum HP (+0.5 AP) for 1.5/3/4.5/6/7.5 seconds. [CD 14/12/10/8/6 seconds, __ mana]
	Revenge - Damages target enemy unit for 10% of his maximum HP (+0.5 AD) and slowing them by 20% for 1/2/3/4/5 seconds. [CD 5/4.5/4/3.5/3 seconds, __ mana]

W: 	Cleansing - Consumes a charge to heal self or target allied champion for 6/7/8/9/10% of Fenrir’s maximum HP (+0.5 AP), remove all debuffs, CC and DoT effects from self or target allied champion, and reduce the duration and effectiveness of all incoming CC effects by 20/30/40/50/60 % for 5 seconds. [CD 12/10/8/6/4 seconds, __ mana]
	Chaos - Consumes a charge , granting an allied champion a 15% MS boost for 6/7/8/9/10 seconds and empowering their next basic attack so that it stuns for 1 seconds. [CD 25/22/19/16/13 seconds, __ mana]
	Charges are gained on kill/assist or every minute up to a maximum of 3, and all charges are lost on death.

E: 	Joy - Leaps in target direction, slowing enemies and speeding allies he lands on within a small radius by 15/30/45/60/75 % for 5/4.5/4/3.5/3 seconds. Jumps double distance when towards allied champions. [CD 17/15/12/10/8 seconds, no cost]
	Rage - Leaps in a target direction, knocking ALL units away from him when he lands and dealing 150/190/230/270/310 (+0.75 AD) to enemy units. Jumps double distance when towards enemy champions. [CD 17/15/12/10/8 seconds, no cost]
	

R: Wereshift - Transforms into his wereform for 30 seconds, activated again to prematurely shift back. Gains a 50% MS boost for 2 seconds after shifting, as well as altering the effects of his abilities. Kills/assists reduce the CD of Wereshift by 1 second. If Wereshift is cancelled, the CD is reduced by whatever time was remaining of the duration at the moment of cancellation. [CD 250/180/120 seconds, no cost]


City/Faction: Wilds (Nidalee)
Position: Bot/Top
Role: TankSupport/Tank

Evange
The Warshifter

AA Type: Varied.
Cost Type: Health

Passive: Planar Equilibrium - Kills and assists return twice as much health as the cost of the last skill activated (dragon and baron).

Q:	Hellwhip - upon activation, lashes out with a dark whip dealing 50/75/110/155/210 (+0.7 AD) and rooting them for 2 seconds. While active, the Hellwhip grants Evange increased attack range, and his basic attacks apply a 13/16/19/21/24% slow. [CD 13/11/9/7/5 seconds, 10% current HP]

W:	Earthshard - upon activation, Evange breaks free of any CC effects and gains a 35/40/45/50/55% MS boost for 1/1.5/2/2.5/3 seconds. While active, the Earthshard grants Evange a 25/30/35/40/45% AS boost and basic attacks apply a bleeding debuff that deals 20/50/80/110/140 (+0.4 AD) per second for 4 seconds. Subsequent attacks do not stack the bleed, but will reset the timer. [CD 19/17/15/13/11 seconds, 10% current HP]

E:	Heavenhammer - upon activation, Evange launches himself into the air, catches the Heavenhammer, and slams back into the ground, dealing 80/130/190/260/340 (+0.6 AP) in a radius around him and knocking enemy units away from him. Enemy units in the centre of the radius are stunned for 1/1.5/2/2.5/3 seconds. While active, every third basic attack against the same target stuns for 0.25/0.5/0.75/1/1.25 seconds and heals Evange for 60/90/120/150/180 (+0.5 AP). [CD 21/18/15/12/9 seconds, 5% max HP]

R:	Incantation of the Planes - After channeling for 3 seconds, Evange activates all three Planegifts at once, launching himself at the target location in a demi-semi-global range, rooting all enemies, applying the bleed debuff, and dealing 260/300/360 (+0.9 AP) in an area around him. Additionally, he gains a 150/250/350 point shield, with a bonus 100 points for every enemy champion hit. [CD 180/140/100 seconds, 30% max HP]


City/Faction: Shurima
Position: Top/Mid/Jungle
Role: Bruiser/Tank/APC

Baruda
The Misfit Monk

AA Type: Melee = Chops/Palms
Cost Type: Energy (200)

Passive: Inner Turmoil - After use, each ability swaps between effects. Conditioning; hitting an enemy unit grants 5% bonus movement speed, stacking up to 4 times.

Q:	Spirit Link - Channel; Baruda’s next basic attack deals 30/60/90/120/160 (+1 AP) and steals 20/25/30/35/40% MS speed from that unit. Repurcussion; Baruda’s next basic attack hits twice in quick succession, dealing 40/70/110/160/220 (+0.5 AP), knocking the unit back and stunning for 1/1.25/1.5/1.75/2 seconds. Units hit by the stunned unit are slowed by 20% at all ranks. Spirit Link restores 10 energy when striking an enemy champion. [CD 7/6/5/4/3 seconds, 20 energy]

W:	Body Link - Block; Baruda reduces the damage of the next incoming ability by 35/40/45/50/55% and recovers 100 energy. Strike; Expends his remaining energy to dash to a target enemy, allied or neutral unit and deal 90/120/170/230/320 (+0.8 AP) damage. Strike returns 10 energy for every enemy unit within the blast radius. [CD 20/18/16/14/12 seconds, 70 energy]

E:	Mind Link - Foresight; dashes in a direction, dealing 40/70/110/160/220 (+0.5 AP) to all units hit and  slowing them by 20/30/40/50/60% for 3/3.5/4/4.5/5 seconds. Hindsight; dashes in a direction, healing 10% of his maximum HP for every enemy champion hit and stunning them for 0.5/0.75/1/1.25/1.5 seconds. Time Sight restores 20 energy for every enemy champion hit. [CD 8/7/6/5/4 seconds, 70 energy]

R:	Insight - Immediately resets all CDs, and grants 50/60/70% CDR for 4/6/8 seconds. [CD 280/220/160 seconds, no cost]


City/Faction: Ionia
Position: Top/Mid
Role: APB/APC
